name: "Dream Recipe" Remy & Linguini
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《PIXAR》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 2 or higher card among those cards, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Together, We Can Do It. To Infinity and Beyond, Woody & Buzz
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《PIXAR》, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Farewell and Departure" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent reveals the top 6 cards of their deck, shuffles their deck, and puts X cards from the top of their deck into their clock. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards.

name: Woody & Jessie & Bullseye
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《PIXAR》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

name: The Toy Story Gang, Slinky Dog
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you do not have another character in your back stage, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage.

name: Bizzare Adventure, Miguel & Héctor & Dante
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Leader of the Toys, Woody Pride
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath your "The Toy Story Gang, Jessie" or this card as a marker.

name: Bonnie's Favorite, Forky
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room.

name: The Toy Story Gang, Hamm
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.

name: The Toy Story Gang, Jessie
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《PIXAR》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them face down in any order underneath this card as markers, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Joy & Sadness & Anger & Disgust & Fear
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: The Toy Story Gang, Bullseye
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card face up underneath a character in battle as a marker] When your other "Leader of the Toys, Woody Pride" or "The Toy Story Gang, Jessie" becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 that character. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《PIXAR》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "World Inside One's Head" Joy & Bing Bong
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《PIXAR》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.

name: Strong Family Bond, Miguel & Coco
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or memory, this card gets +4500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if "Coco" is in your climax area, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Strong Family Bond, Miguel & Coco" in your memory, put it in any position of your stage, and that character gets +1500 power, +1 soul, 《Music》 and 《Family》 until end of turn.

name: Culinary Genius, Remy
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.

name: Boy Who Loves Music, Miguel
text: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may return this card to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 "Lost Memories, Héctor & Coco" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.

name: Figure of Admiration, Remy & Gusteau
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] When your other 《PIXAR》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: World Full of Colors and Surprises, Joy & Sadness
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Chefs, Linguini & Colette
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3500, Level 2 [(1) Reveal this card in your hand & Put it at the bottom of your deck] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn)

name: Dream of Being a Chef, Remy
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Together, We Can Do It. Woody Pride
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "To Infinity and Beyond, Buzz Lightyear", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory.

name: Song of Miracles, Miguel & Héctor
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more 《PIXAR》 characters, this card gets +4500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room]".

name: Lost Memories, Héctor & Coco
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or memory, this card gets +4500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your climax phase, if your level is 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, put this card in an open position of your stage.

name: Inside Out
text: If you have 5 or more 《PIXAR》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. Put this card at the bottom of your deck. "Draw up to 3 cards, choose 3 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room." "All of your characters get +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."" "All of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn." "You may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand." "You may choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."

name: Ratatouille
text: Your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock. Choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: How to Treat Toys
text: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《PIXAR》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 1 level 0 or lower 《PIXAR》 character, put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck." "You may choose 1 "Bond of Friendship, Woody & Buzz" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "Your opponent cannot play events from their hand or use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn." (The "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule cannot be used either)

name: Farewell and Departure
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Coco
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: PIXAR Luxo Jr.
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《PIXAR》, this card gets +2 level and +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: "29th Century Love Story" WALL・E & EVE
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: The Toy Story Gang, Bo Peep
text: 【CONT】 Experience If "The Toy Story Gang, Bo Peep" is in your level, this card gets +6500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: The Toy Story Gang, Rex
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: To Protect His Friends, Flik
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Scarer, Mike Wazowski
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Scarer, James P. Sullivan" in your center stage, this card gets +5500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【CONT】 All of your other "Scarer, James P. Sullivan" get +1500 power and the following abilities. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."

name: "First" Friendship, Arlo & Spot
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to your hand.

name: New Action Figure, Buzz Lightyear
text: 【CONT】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if this card would attack, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's back stage, and this card frontal attacks that character as the defending character instead. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Toy Story" is in your climax area, you may put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 [(5) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.

name: School Life, Mike
text: 【ACT】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card at the bottom of your deck] Choose 1 《PIXAR》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: To Protect the Peace of the Galaxy, Buzz & Zurg
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×500.

name: To Hold Someone's Hand One Day, WALL・E
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Gleaming White Robot, EVE", this card gets the following ability. "【CONT】 Memory If "WALL・E" is in your memory, this card gets +3000 power and +1 soul."

name: The Toy Story Gang, Aliens
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other "The Toy Story Gang, Aliens" in your center stage.

name: Apatosaurus, Arlo & Spot
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less characters in their center stage, choose up to 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.

name: Gleaming White Robot, EVE
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock."

name: Flik and Friends
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "A Bug's Life" is in your climax area, and you have another 《PIXAR》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."

name: To Infinity and Beyond, Buzz Lightyear
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《PIXAR》 characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Together, We Can Do It. Woody Pride", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: The Good Dinosaur
text: Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. Put this card into your stock.

name: WALL・E
text: Choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. Put this card into your memory. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Toy Story
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: A Bug's Life
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Coach-Disciple Bond, McQueen & Doc
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "Mystery-Shrouded Past, Doc Hudson" is in your memory, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "Greatest Teamwork, McQueen & Mater" in your hand] When "Cars" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have 2 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《PIXAR》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Superheroes, The Incredibles
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《PIXAR》 character, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Greatest Teamwork, McQueen & Mater
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it in any position of your stage, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Friends From Radiator Springs" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of their deck. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Always Cheerful, Mater
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, put it face up underneath this card as a marker, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 character from the markers underneath this card, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Family That Merida Loves, DunBroch Family
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand] When "Brave" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《PIXAR》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Star Racer, Lightning McQueen
text: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《PIXAR》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.

name: Family Bond, The Incredibles
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Elastigirl & Violet
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《PIXAR》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Talking About Dreams, Sally & McQueen
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Resonate [(1) Reveal 1 "Greatest Teamwork, McQueen & Mater" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《PIXAR》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Princess Who Loves Freedom, Merida
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《PIXAR》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Mr. Incredible & Dash & Jack-Jack
text: 【CONT】 If "Elastigirl & Violet" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Mr. Incredible" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and all of your characters are 《PIXAR》, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 1 "Mr. Incredible & Dash & Jack-Jack", put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck." "You may choose 1 of your other 《PIXAR》 characters, and 【STAND】 it." "You may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."

name: New Partner, McQueen & Cruz
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《PIXAR》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.

name: Mystery-Shrouded Past, Doc Hudson
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and move it to another open position of their center stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Choose 1 "Coach-Disciple Bond, McQueen & Doc" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Voice-Activated Disguise, Mater
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《PIXAR》 character, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Princess and Queen, Merida & Elinor
text: 【CONT】 If there are 2 or more markers underneath this card, this card gets 《Witch's Magic》 and cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your draw phase, if there are 1 or less markers underneath this card, look at the top card of your deck, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.

name: Astounding Speed, Guido
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《PIXAR》 characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, return up to 4 cards from the bottom of your stock to your hand, choose the same number of cards in your hand, and put them at the bottom of your stock in any order.

name: Crossroads of Life, Lightning McQueen
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Dream of Being a Racer, Cruz Ramires" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Dream of Being a Racer, Cruz Ramires
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Merida & Harris & Hubert & Hamish
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×1000.

name: Cars
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Friends From Radiator Springs
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Brave
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Mr. Incredible
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Nemo & Marlin & Dory
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Cheerful Monsters, Sulley & Mike
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Monsters, Inc." is in your climax area, and you have another 《PIXAR》 character, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Journey to Find Magic, Ian & Barley
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Onward" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Sparkle of Life, Joe & 22
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 "Soul, Joe & 22" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 2 or higher card among those cards, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Adventure and Friendship, Luca & Alberto & Giulia
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《PIXAR》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: Greatest Adventure, Carl & Russel & Dug & Kevin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Greatest Adventure, Carl & Russel & Dug & Kevin" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Greatest Adventure, Carl & Russel & Dug & Kevin" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Scarer, James P. Sullivan
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more "Cheerful Monsters, Sulley & Mike" in your waiting room, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in your center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: School Life, Sulley
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《PIXAR》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Surfer Family, Crush & Squirt
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, and return it to your hand.

name: Dory & Destiny & Bailey
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has 3 or less characters, this card gets +3000 power.

name: Reason to Embark on a Journey, Carl & Ellie
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory.

name: Gil & His Tank Friends
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《PIXAR》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: "Half" a Body, Ian & Barley & Wilden
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Perplexed Emotions, Sulley & Boo
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Marine Life Institute, Dory & Hank
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Clownfish, Nemo & Marlin
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《PIXAR》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if "Finding Nemo" is in your climax area, and you have another 《PIXAR》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts the top 20 cards of their deck into their waiting room, you look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it at the bottom of their deck, and put the rest on the top of their deck in any order.

name: When They Were Students, Sulley & Mike
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room." 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《PIXAR》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Ian & Barley & Laurel
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《PIXAR》 character from your stage into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Time They Have Left, Ian & Barley
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 《PIXAR》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it at the bottom of their deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Partners, Marlin & Dory
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《PIXAR》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: A New World, Luca
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Luca" is placed on your climax area, if you have 1 or less other character in your center stage, choose up to 2 《PIXAR》 characters in your waiting room, put them into your stock in any order, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《PIXAR》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Full of Curiosity, Boo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《PIXAR》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: To The Skies, Carl Fredricksen

If that card is an event or a 《PIXAR》 character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 If this card is 【STAND】 in your back stage, you may choose this card as the character that performs an attack. If you do, this card direct attacks." (Return the revealed card to its original place)

If you do, you may put this card in an open position of your stage.

name: Onward
text: If you have 5 or more 《PIXAR》 characters, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." Put this card into your clock.

name: Greatest Scarer Duo, Sulley & Mike
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《PIXAR》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Eta Hiss Hiss (HSS)
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Slugma Slugma Kappa (EEK)
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

name: Roar Omega Roar (ROR)
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《PIXAR》 character in your back stage.

name: Jaws Theta Chi (JOX)
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《PIXAR》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: School of Scaring, Sulley
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Sulley & Mike & Boo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Fatherly Affection" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent 2 times, and this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Fatherly Affection
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Friendly Tow Truck, Mater
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Racing Prodigy, Lightning McQueen
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《PIXAR》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Mater
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand.

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Sarge
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《PIXAR》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Red
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《PIXAR》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Esteemed Pit Crew, Luigi
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] This card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: Trailer, Mack
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: New Friend, Cruz Ramirez
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Competing for His Comeback" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Competing for His Comeback
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Cool Beauty, Sally Carrera
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《PIXAR》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Fillmore
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《PIXAR》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Flo
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Resident of Radiator Springs, Ramone" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 Bond/"Resident of Radiator Springs, Ramone" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Resident of Radiator Springs, Ramone" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Lizzie
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《PIXAR》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Holley Shiftwell
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 2 or more 《PIXAR》 characters, look at your opponent's hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Resident of Radiator Springs, Sheriff
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《PIXAR》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Greatest Rival, Jackson Storm
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《PIXAR》 characters. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck."

name: Legendary Racer, Doc Hudson
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《PIXAR》 characters, you may choose 1 《PIXAR》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Esteemed Pit Crew, Guido
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your 《PIXAR》 characters in battle, and put it into your memory. At the beginning of your next draw phase, put that character from your memory in any position of your stage, and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Finn McMissile
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Piston Cup
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
